004package mkt;
005
006import java.util.ArrayList;
007import kut.Js;
008import kut.Arr;
009
010/** Result of 'Strategy.xxxSimple' group. */
011public class StGroupRs {
012  /**
013   * Number of sales.<br>
014   * One entry for each Parameter in the same order.
015   * */
016  public final int[] sales;
017  /**
018   * Cash + withdrawals + portfolio evaluated with closes. <br>
019   * One entry for each Parameter in the same order.
020   */
021  public final double[] assets;
022  /**
023   * Cash + withdrawals + portfolio evaluated with prices. <br>
024   * One entry for each Parameter in the same order.
025   */
026  public final double[] accs;
027  /**
028   * Cash + withdrawals + portfolio evaluated with references.<br>
029   * One entry for each Parameter in the same order.
030   */
031  public final double[] rfAssets;
032
033  /**
034   * Constructor.
035   * @param sales Number of sales.<br>
036   *        One entry for each Parameter in the same order.
037   * @param assets Cash + withdrawals + portfolio evaluated with closes.<br>
038   *        One entry for each Parameter in the same order.
039   * @param accs Cash + withdrawals + portfolio evaluated with prices.<br>
040   *        One entry for each Parameter in the same order.
041   * @param rfAssets Cash + withdrawals + portfolio evaluated with references.<br>
042   *        One entry for each Parameter in the same order.
043   */
044  public StGroupRs (
045    int[] sales, double[] assets, double[] accs, double[] rfAssets
046  ) {
047    this.sales = sales;
048    this.assets = assets;
049    this.accs = accs;
050    this.rfAssets = rfAssets;
051 }
052
053  /**
054   * Returns object JSONized.
055   * @param o Ditto.
056   * @return Ditto.
057   */
058  public static String toJs (StGroupRs o) {
059    return Js.w(Arr.mk(
060      Js.w(Arr.map(Arr.mk(o.sales), Js::w)),
061      Js.w(Arr.map(Arr.mk(o.assets), Js::w)),
062      Js.w(Arr.map(Arr.mk(o.accs), Js::w)),
063      Js.w(Arr.map(Arr.mk(o.rfAssets), Js::w))
064    ));
065  }
066
067  /**
068   * Returns object from JSON.
069   * @param js JSON string.
070   * @return Ditto.
071   */
072  public static StGroupRs fromJs (String js) {
073    ArrayList<String> a = Js.ra(js);
074    return new StGroupRs(
075      Arr.toInts(Arr.map(Js.ra(a.get(0)), (v) -> (int)Js.rn(v))),
076      Arr.toDoubles(Arr.map(Js.ra(a.get(1)), Js::rn)),
077      Arr.toDoubles(Arr.map(Js.ra(a.get(2)), Js::rn)),
078      Arr.toDoubles(Arr.map(Js.ra(a.get(3)), Js::rn))
079    );
080  }
081}
